name: Zero Divide 2
overview: The XTAL Corporation has taken control of the world's computer networks. Metal clashes with metal as, through the use of a range of individually-styled fighting robots, you prepare to take on the might of XTAL and fight for the freedom of Earth. 10 characters, sporting all-new attacks moves and aditional projectile attacks, battle it out in a variety of deadly arenas. Improved hi-resolution graphics and superb lightning and "motion-blur" effects all running at 50 frames per second!.
